title: The Home Game
overview: Interior design expert Linda Barker presents a new ITV daytime series that sees home owners compete to make the most profit from a major property renovation.The Home Game turns the makeover format on its head by fast forwarding to the exciting bit â€“ the transformation and the price.The ten part series features four stories per episode, with makeovers ranging from high end kitchen extensions to restorations, garden overhauls and garage conversions.
